reviews.author: Peter L.
reviews.text: Everything is clear, fast, and high quality! Highly recommend and hope to work together again.

reviews.author: Bryan Finch
reviews.text: Excellent work on the landing page (React+Next). Thank you!

reviews.author: Ivan Latypin
reviews.text: Fast and high quality. He was the only one who communicated adequately before starting the work.

reviews.author: Anonymous
reviews.text: Everything was done perfectly. Thank you! I will be glad to cooperate again.

reviews.author: Alexey Doronin
reviews.text: Completed the project on time and with excellent quality!

reviews.author: andro_g
reviews.text: Responsive developer, I recommend him with confidence!

reviews.author: Illarion Panovsky
reviews.text: Completed the CSS fixes in the shortest possible time. Very satisfied with the cooperation.

reviews.author: Egor Burkaba
reviews.text: Excellent communication and great code. Highly recommend.

reviews.author: Ekaterina Blokhina
reviews.text: Fixed several issues on the WordPress site. Everything is great!

reviews.author: Roma B.
reviews.text: Website copy completed. Everything is excellent, thanks!

reviews.author: Evgeny Butkov
reviews.text: Good programmer. Performed the task quickly and on time.

reviews.author: Nikolay MPM
reviews.text: Recommended! 5 out of 5 stars for everything.

reviews.author: Dmitry Evdokimov
reviews.text: Mirislam did the job quickly and correctly. Very happy with the result.

reviews.author: Ivan Chernev
reviews.text: Responded quickly to clarifications and completed the task on time.

reviews.author: Ilya Usanov
reviews.text: Handled the layout perfectly. Polite, punctual, and highly recommended.

reviews.author: Selfie77
reviews.text: Excellent executor. Fixed the block on the landing page perfectly.

reviews.author: DoingGood
reviews.text: Everything is perfect. Recommend for cooperation.

reviews.author: Domino Tor
reviews.text: Layout for the Sketch application — everything is super.

reviews.author: Nikita Zaitsev
reviews.text: Very patient and professional. Did everything fast and even cheaper than requested. A great guy!

reviews.author: kostia_o
reviews.text: Inserted ready-made images into the layout. All good!

reviews.author: dcpr
reviews.text: Reliable and conscientious. Completed 10 pages exactly according to the technical requirements.

reviews.author: Alexey Kopievsky
reviews.text: Pleasant to work with. Mirislam understands tasks without issues and provides high-quality work.

reviews.author: Ren Ren
reviews.text: Clean and readable code. Handled the complex form layout quickly. Recommended!

reviews.author: Andrey Petrov
reviews.text: High-quality site development. All minor edits were fixed immediately. I advise everyone to work with him.

reviews.author: Пётр Л.
reviews.text: Все отлично, быстро, качественно! Рекомендую! Надеюсь еще посотрудничать в будущем.

reviews.author: Bryan Finch
reviews.text: Отличная работа по лендингу на React+Next. Спасибо!

reviews.author: Иван Латынин
reviews.text: Быстро и качественно. Оказался единственным, кто адекватно прокоммуниковал перед взятием в работу.

reviews.author: Аноним
reviews.text: Все отлично выполнено. Спасибо. Буду сотрудничать еще.

reviews.author: Алексей Доронин
reviews.text: Выполнил все в срок и с отличным качеством!

reviews.author: andro_g
reviews.text: Отзывчивый разработчик, уверенно рекомендую!

reviews.author: Илларион Пановский
reviews.text: В кратчайшие сроки сделал правки по CSS. Сотрудничеством доволен.

reviews.author: Егор Буркаба
reviews.text: Отличная коммуникация, отличный код. Рекомендую.

reviews.author: Екатерина Блохина
reviews.text: Выполнила ряд правок сайта на WP. Все отлично!

reviews.author: Рома B.
reviews.text: Сделал копию сайта. Спасибо! Все отлично!

reviews.author: Евгений Бутков
reviews.text: Хороший программист. Выполнил быстро и в срок.

reviews.author: Николай MPM
reviews.text: Рекомендую! По всем 5 из 5.

reviews.author: Дмитрий Евдокимов
reviews.text: Мирислам работу сделал быстро и правильно, результатом доволен.

reviews.author: Иван Чернев
reviews.text: Оперативно реагировал на уточнения и выполнил задачу в срок.

reviews.author: Илья Усанов
reviews.text: Вовремя и качественно справился с вёрсткой, вежливый и пунктуальный, рекомендую.

reviews.author: Selfie77
reviews.text: Отличный исполнитель. Поправил блок на лендинге.

reviews.author: DoingGood
reviews.text: Все отлично. Рекомендую к сотрудничеству.

reviews.author: Domino Tor
reviews.text: Сверстал макет приложения из Sketch — все супер.

reviews.author: Никита Зайцев
reviews.text: Очень терпеливый и профессиональный человек. Сделал все быстро и даже дешевле, чем просили. Красавчик!

reviews.author: kostia_o
reviews.text: Вставил готовые картинки в готовую верстку. Все хорошо!

reviews.author: dcpr
reviews.text: Надежный и добросовестный. Сверстал 10 страниц четко по ТЗ и вовремя.

reviews.author: Алексей Копиевский
reviews.text: Приятно сотрудничать. Понимает задачу без проблем, качество отличное.

reviews.author: Ren Ren
reviews.text: Чистый и читабельный код. Быстро справился с версткой сложной формы. Рекомендую!

reviews.author: Андрей Петров
reviews.text: Качественная разработка сайта. Все мелкие правки вносил сразу. Советую всем работать с ним.

reviews.author: Pyotr L.
reviews.text: Hammasi a'lo, tez va sifatli! Tavsiya qilaman! Kelajakda yana hamkorlik qilishga umid qilaman.

reviews.author: Bryan Finch
reviews.text: React+Next-dagi lending bo'yicha a'lo ish. Rahmat!

reviews.author: Ivan Latypin
reviews.text: Tez va sifatli. Ishni boshlashdan oldin muloqot qilgan yagona mutaxassis bo'ldi.

reviews.author: Anonim
reviews.text: Hammasi a'lo bajarildi. Rahmat. Yana hamkorlik qilaman.

reviews.author: Alexey Doronin
reviews.text: Vazifani o'z vaqtida va a'lo sifat bilan bajardi!

reviews.author: andro_g
reviews.text: E'tiborli dasturchi, ishonch bilan tavsiya qilaman!

reviews.author: Ilnar Panovsky
reviews.text: Qisqa vaqt ichida CSS tuzatishlarini kiritdi. Hamkorlikdan mamnunman.

reviews.author: Egor Burkaba
reviews.text: A'lo muloqot va sifatli kod. Tavsiya qilaman.

reviews.author: Ekaterina Blinova
reviews.text: WP saytidagi bir qator kamchiliklarni tuzatdi. Hammasi zo'r!

reviews.author: Roma B.
reviews.text: Sayt nusxasini tayyorladi. Rahmat! Hammasi a'lo!

reviews.author: Evgeny Butenko
reviews.text: Yaxshi dasturchi. Tez va vaqtida bajardi.

reviews.author: Nikolay MPM
reviews.text: Tavsiya qilaman! Barcha ko'rsatkichlar bo'yicha 5 dan 5.

reviews.author: Dmitry Evdokimov
reviews.text: Mirislam ishni tez va to'g'ri bajardi, natijadan mamnunman.

reviews.author: Ivan Chernov
reviews.text: Anliqlashtirishlarga tez javob berdi va vazifani vaqtida yakunladi.

reviews.author: Ilya Usanov
reviews.text: Verstkani sifatli va o'z vaqtida bajardi, xushmuomala va punktual, tavsiya qilaman.

reviews.author: Selfie77
reviews.text: A'lo ijrochi. Lendingdagi blokni tuzatib berdi.

reviews.author: DoingGood
reviews.text: Hammasi zo'r. Hamkorlik uchun tavsiya qilaman.

reviews.author: Domino Tor
reviews.text: Sketch-dan ilova maketini verstka qildi — hammasi super.

reviews.author: Nikita Zaitsev
reviews.text: Juda sabrli va professional inson. Tez va so'ralganidan ham arzonroq qilib berdi. Baraka topsin!

reviews.author: kostia_o
reviews.text: Tayyor rasmlarni verstkaga joylashtirdi. Hammasi yaxshi!

reviews.author: dcpr
reviews.text: Ishonchli va vijdonli. 10 ta sahifani aniq va vaqtida topshirdi.

reviews.author: Alexey Kopievsky
reviews.text: Hamkorlik qilish yoqimli. Vazifani muammosiz tushunadi, sifat a'lo darajada.

reviews.author: Ren Ren
reviews.text: Toza va tushunarli kod. Murakkab shaklni tezda verstka qildi. Tavsiya qilaman!

reviews.author: Andrey Petrov
reviews.text: Sifatli sayt ishlab chiqish. Barcha mayda tuzatishlarni darhol kiritdi. Hamkorlik qilishni maslahat beraman.
